serversJson.title: Holder benefits
serversJson.parText: Satisfaction that you are involved in a community where the lives of many little cancer patients will have a different path.
serversJson.destails1: - You will be able to bid or donate your NFT to the cases presented on our platform. we encourage you to do this and in time we will develop rewards for donors.
serversJson.destails2: - Perks offered by our current and future partnerships.
serversJson.destails3: - Discount on the next collection inspired by children with this disease from all over the world-whitelist spot to the collections of our partners.
serversJson.destails4: - Whitelist spot to the collections of our partners.
serversJson.destails5: - As a eHOPEwarriors NFT holder, you'll be eligible for future airdrops of tokens, nfts and other prizes.
serversJson.destails6: - Give back to the community through airdrops and rewards.
